sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.enterprise_uid ,main.sign_company_uid ,main.user_uid ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,user.user_name user_name ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM sys_sign_company_manage main LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.uid = main.user_uid LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1 ${dynamicCondition}
